timeline.message:
Allow webBundle-1.0 feature to tolerate servlet-5 for jakartaee9 wab support.

Take care of wab installer internal references to javax.servlet* types. Create two auto-provisioned private features one that supports pre jakartaee9 and one post ee-9 to be selected from depending on weather or not servlet-5 is enabled.

Allow webBundle-1.0 feature to tolerate servlet-5 for jakartaee9 wab support.

Take care of wab installer internal references to javax.servlet* types. Create two auto-provisioned private features one that supports pre jakartaee9 and one post ee-9 to be selected from depending on weather or not servlet-5 is enabled.

jakartaee9: webBundle-1.0 feature to tolerate servlet-5.

Take care of wab installer internal references to javax.servlet* types. Create two auto-provisioned private features one that supports pre jakartaee9 and one post ee-9 to be selected from depending on weather or not servlet-5 is enabled.

jakartaee9: webBundle-1.0 feature to tolerate servlet-5.

Take care of wab installer internal references to javax.servlet* types. Create two auto-provisioned private features one that supports pre jakartaee9 and one post ee-9 to be selected from depending on weather or not servlet-5 is enabled.

timeline.bodyText: @sebratton please remove all IBM Confidential headers, templates and code ... ASAP!!
timeline.author: tevans78
